project.name: |-- 004-template-method
project.description:
Keywords: + Functional Programming, Java 8 + Template Method Pattern
This project includes a very simple example that illustrates how to implement the Template Method pattern using lambdas.
OnlineBankingRunner: In the example, an OnlineBanking class is defined with a processCustomer() method that accepts a Consumer. The consumer logic is applied when the fixed part of the algorithm is complete, thus implementing the template method pattern.
